invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for MRIQC: Automatic prediction of quality and visual reporting of MRI scans in BIDS format

gear.author: Poldrack Lab, Stanford University
gear.description: MRIQC (v0.15.1) extracts no-reference IQMs (image quality metrics) from structural (T1w and T2w) and functional MRI (magnetic resonance imaging) data.
gear.label: MRIQC: Automatic prediction of quality and visual reporting of MRI scans in BIDS format
gear.name: bids-mriqc
gear.cite: Esteban O, Birman D, Schaer M, Koyejo OO, Poldrack RA, Gorgolewski KJ; MRIQC: Advancing the Automatic Prediction of Image Quality in MRI from Unseen Sites; PLOS ONE 12(9):e0184661; doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0184661.

ica.description: Run ICA on the raw data and include the componentsin the individual reports (slow but potentially very insightful)

ants-settings.description: path to JSON file with settings for ANTS

mem_gb.description: Memory to use (default is 90% of total available)

webapi-port.description: port where the MRIQC WebAPI is listening

start-idx.description: Initial volume in functional timeseries that should be considered for preprocessing

no-sub.description: Turn off submission of anonymized quality metrics to MRIQC’s metrics repository

deoblique.description: Deoblique the functional scans during head motion correction preprocessing

stop-idx.description: Final volume in functional timeseries that should be considered for preprocessing

hmc-afni.description: Use ANFI 3dvolreg for head motion correction (HMC) - default

email.description: Email address to include with quality metric submission

ants-nthreads.description: number of threads that will be set in ANTs processes

hmc-fsl.description: Use FSL MCFLIRT instead of AFNI for head motion correction (HMC)

profile.description: hook up the resource profiler callback to nipype

webapi-url.description: IP address where the MRIQC WebAPI is listening

float32.description: Cast the input data to float32 if it’s represented in higher precision (saves space and improves perfomance)

gear-save-intermediate-work.description: Gear will save ALL intermediate output into mriqc_work.zip

gear-zip-html.description: Gear will save each html file as a zip archive for easy on-platform viewing

verbose.description: increases mriqc log verbosity for each occurence, debug level is -vvv

ants-float.description: use float number precision on ANTs computations

despike.description: Despike the functional scans during head motion correction preprocessing

gear-abort-on-bids-error.description: Gear will not run mriqc if there are any BIDS errors detected

run-id.description: [RUN_ID [RUN_ID ...]] filter input dataset by run id (only integer run ids are valid)

gear-run-bids-validation.description: Gear will run BIDS validation before mriqc.  If validation fails and gear-abort-on-bids-error is true, mriq will NOT be run.

fft-spikes-detector.description: Turn on FFT based spike detector (slow)

task-id.description: [TASK_ID [TASK_ID ...]] filter input dataset by task id
